issue.title: [Python] Reduce the number docstring violations using numpydoc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7898](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7898). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is going to require more than one patch, because we have more than a thousand violations, but we need to start somewhere.
